markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 635 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

This magic comes from the primal tradition, connecting to the natural world and instinct. Anything with this trait is [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103).
name: Primal
